isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Service (1995 through 1999) - SECTION 4: CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - CYLINDER HEAD INSPECTION - INSPECT FOR CRACKS (USING DYE PENETRANT METHOD OEM1272)

svcproc.title: INSPECT FOR CRACKS (USING DYE PENETRANT METHOD OEM1272)
svcproc.para:
Visually inspect for cylinder head cracks using the four step dye penetrant method as follows: (Refer to Figure 4.31
.)
STEP ONE - Spray the cleaner onto the lower deck (gasket surface) of the head and wipe dry.
STEP TWO - Spray on the dye penetrant. Allow the dye to remain on the surface from one (1) to ten (10) minutes.
STEP THREE - Wipe the dye off the surface.

note.para: Dye will remain in any cracks during the "wipe off" step.

svcproc.para: STEP FOUR - Spray on the developer and let dry for five to fifteen minutes.

figure.caption: Figure 4.31 Checking Cylinder Head For Cracks

note.para: Cracks will show up as purple lines against the white developer. Refer to Figure 4.32.
IF ANY CRACKS ARE PRESENT, REPLACE THE CYLINDER HEAD.
